section.p: The bottle contains a treasure map. ‘A bloomin’ funny thing to find in a bottle,’ is all the bosun has to say when he sees it.
The helmsman is more helpful. ‘See this stretch of coastline? It might indicate the Sea of Hydras.’
‘No,’ says the first mate with a dour shake of his head. ‘It’s the straits near Teleos, I’m sure of it.’
